department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: Storage lockers for storage of uniforms and office equipment
description: Storage lockers are required for CFB Esquimalt. The following are required to be purchased: \\(1) Uniform storage lockers; and \\(2) lockers for office equipment and supplies. Entities must be able to meet the doorway restrictions included within the solicitation package.
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement: Storage Cabinets ##

### Summary ###

A request for proposal (RFP) is being issued for the procurement of storage cabinets to be used at Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Esquimalt. The successful bidder will be required to deliver two types of storage lockers that meet specific requirements, including doorway restrictions.

### Tender Details ###

* **Contract Reference:** WS4030734034
* **Publication Date:** July 18, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** August 30, 2023, at 14:00:00 (Eastern Time)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** N/A
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2025
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (Demande de Propositions)

### Procurement Information ###

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (Categorie des approvisionnements)
* **Notice Type:** Competitive (Concurrentiel)
* **Procurement Method:** Open Bidding (Question ouverte à soumissionner)
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price (Prix le plus bas)

### Contract Information ###

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End-User Entity:** Department of National Defence (DND)
* **Regions of Delivery:** British Columbia (Colombie-Britannique)

### Contact Information ###

* **Contact Name:** Bill Reusch, SPAC/PSPC
* **Contact Email:** bill.reusch@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Additional Information ###

* Please visit the following URL to access the tender package: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16909771?extsite=MTY5MDk3NzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* Please note that this is an Expiration notice, as the original tender closing date has already passed. However, prospective bidders may still visit the above link to access the cancelled tender package for reference purposes only.  Please contact the Contracting Authority if you require any additional information.   [ Contact Information:  bill.reusch@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:bill.reusch@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

I removed the.lastIndexOf redundant information, made sure the formatting and paragraphs were well-organized. In addition, I provided all the necessary details to the government tender announcement in a clear, concise language.
